sentences.sContent: Here is our offer, 300 Euro per ton, CIF Singapore.
sentences.sContent_eng: Here is our offer, 300 Euro per ton, CIF Singapore.
sentences.sCn: 我们的报盘，每吨300欧元新加坡到岸价。

sentences.sContent: We shall effect the insurance of the goods for 110% of their CIF value.
sentences.sContent_eng: We shall effect the insurance of the goods for 110% of their CIF value.
sentences.sCn: 我方将按照货物到岸价金额的110%对这批货物进行投保。

sentences.sContent: Our offer is New York CIF. Will you please tell us your unloading port, please?
sentences.sContent_eng: Our offer is New York CIF. Will you please tell us your unloading port, please?
sentences.sCn: 我们报的是纽约港的到岸价，你能告诉我们你们的卸货港吗？
